    • nextState

      public ArrayList<int[]> nextState​(ArrayList<Cell> neighbours)
      Give the next state of the cell using game of life rules.
      Specified by:
      nextState in class Cell
      Parameters:
      neighbours - List of the cell's neighbours.
      Returns:
      List which represents the cell coordinates and its new state. The list is empty if the state doesn't change.
